titleStmt.title: Nine sermons vpon sun[drie] texts of scripture first, The allegeance of the cleargie, The supper of the Lord, secondly, The Cape of Good Hope deliuered in fiue sermons, for the vse and b[ene]fite of marchants and marriners, thirdly, The remedie of d[r]ought, A thankes-giuing for raine / by Samuel Page ...
titleStmt.author: Page, Samuel, 1574-1630.

titleStmt.title: Nine sermons vpon sun[drie] texts of scripture first, The allegeance of the cleargie, The supper of the Lord, secondly, The Cape of Good Hope deliuered in fiue sermons, for the vse and b[ene]fite of marchants and marriners, thirdly, The remedie of d[r]ought, A thankes-giuing for raine / by Samuel Page ...
titleStmt.author: Page, Samuel, 1574-1630.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes for Sim[on Wat]erson dwell[ing in] Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the crowne,

notesStmt.note: T.p. torn and defaced with slight loss of print; bracketed information suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.

"The allegeance of the cleargie", "The supper of the Lord", "The cape of good hope : fiue sermons for the vse of the merchant and mariner", and "The remedy of drought : two sermons" each have a special t.p.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
